title: #125 - Todd Glass & ME
description: Comedian Todd Glass comes over to the Mancave & we talk about warm towels, how to throw great parties, & how to run amn A list comedy club with little to no effort, and the pure joys of a candle, a group of friends, great lighting, & little pot.
